snippet: A sexual discrimination lawsuit by Ellen Pao at the venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins has prompted wider discussion about the treatment of women in the tech world.
abstract: Sexual harassment suit filed by Ellen Pao, a junior partner at the venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, has prompted a wider discussion about the treatment of women in the tech world; suit has surprised some people in Silicon Valley because Kleiner Perkins is among relatively few such firms there to routinely hire and promote women.

byline.contributor: Christine Haughney and Jenna Wortham contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A sexual discrimination lawsuit by Ellen Pao at the venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins has prompted wider discussion about the treatment of women in the tech world.

headline.seo: Lawsuit Against Kleiner Perkins Is Shaking Silicon Valley
headline.main: Lawsuit Shakes Foundation of a Man’s World of Tech
headline.print_headline: A Lawsuit Shakes Foundation of a Man’s World of Tech
